settings.text:
As we've grown and evolved, our desire for a distinctive identity that reflects our passion for innovative design and enduring quality has grown with us. The name 'ALTIQ' was born during a pivotal testing trip in the Neerim Forest, an inspired fusion of 'Altitudes' and 'Intellect'. Now, as a symbol of our journey and our dedication to excellence, the coordinates of this memorable location are proudly embedded across all our packaging. We cherish our roots as Supernova Lighting and are deeply grateful to our loyal customers whose support has been instrumental in shaping our cutting-edge products. Looking ahead, we're exhilarated by the possibilities that the future holds and are committed to continuing our legacy of innovation and excellence under the ALTIQ brand.

We're the same people - in fact, more than ever. The same company, headquarters and family ownership. All warranties transfer across.

In 2013 I wanted to upgrade my dull halogen globes on my euro VW golf. After spending a fortune at local big brand auto stores I was left with dash errors and arguably worse lighting performance. With a passion for electronics, I set out to make my own solution.

Gaining a lot of visual attention with modern, hyper-white DRLs at car meets, the nick-name 'Supernova' caught on quickly and it was hard to keep up with orders since everything was hand soldered and assembled in the garage at home.

Initially, inventory existed in shoe boxes and back packs, taken to the post office and car meets. After hours we learnt how to build our first website and the rest is history.

-Ben Graps

At ALTIQ, we're passionate about innovation, committed to excellence, and dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible. Join us on our journey to explore new worlds, and experience the unmatched quality of our high-performance lighting solutions.

Our team is constantly growing, and we're always on the lookout for curious and ambitious minds who share our passion for adventure, technology, and people.Â Contact us today and be part of the next chapter in our story.
